thread.title: French-Swiss Firm Lafarge Ready to Sell Cement for Trump’s Wall
thread.title_full: French-Swiss Firm Lafarge Ready to Sell Cement for Trump’s Wall

author: Breitbart London
title: French-Swiss Firm Lafarge Ready to Sell Cement for Trump’s Wall

organizations.name: lafarge ready to sell cement for trump

text: NEW YORK, UNITED STATES: A cement mixer from Lafarge SA of France outside the New York Stock Exchange 06 September, 2001, marking the original listing of the company which occured on 23 July. Chairman and CEO Bertrand Collumb rang the opening bell of the NYSE. Lafarge is a world wide leader in building materials. AFP PHOTO/Stan HONDA (Photo credit should read STAN HONDA/AFP/Getty Images)
